name: Evade!
description:
Evade! is a small game where you need to dodge bullets at the last moment to boost your airplane, so that you can fly faster and hit stronger.

Made by angrysnail

  

Controls

  • WASD or ARROW KEYS to move
  • LMB or SPACE to shoot
  • ESCAPE- pause

How to play

 Fly near projectiles to boost your plane. This will increase your speed and damage dealt to the enemies.  You can boost yourself up to four times in a row. While boosted, airplane has a shield that will protect it from one hit and will vanish after that, killing all nearby enemies. 
 Score depends only on distance you've traveled, not amount of killed enemies.
